game.name: Stupid Zombies Hunt
game.description:
These blood-thirsty zombies are back again with more power and aggression. Being the last hope of humanity, you have no other option rather than fighting against the brainless people. Grab your sniper rifle and get ready to clear the area from all these living dead in Stupid Zombies Hunt! Common friends! Many people of this planet rely on your fighting abilities so do not let them disappoint and gear up to give them a solid fight. You are lashed with a powerful weapon. 
Your objective in this one of the best online action games for boys is to eliminate all these deadly monsters from your planet. Be careful all the time since it is not going to be easy to survive among a large horde of dangerous zombies! You are alone in this zombie apocalypse wasteland, but your insane fighting and bravery skills will help get through all the challenges and make win. Practice your shooting abilities perfectly before entering the battlefield in this cool HTML5 zombie game!
You cannot take rest for a while since now you do not have to save you only, but taking care of the lives of your fellow humans is also your responsibility. This war goes for long as you have to find the way to survive through 960 new and challenging levels. Use the grenades, straight bullets, split- and buckshots and more weapons to kill your enemies before they do attack on you! You will be given plenty of ways to test your aiming skills and shoot all the zombies that will come to you! Good luck for your win each time when you meet them! Have a blast with your friends and families without download!
